mods.name: InstaFailAccuracy
mods.details:
InstaFailAccuracy allows you to set a certain accuracy threshold that if you go below, you will fail the level! All of these can be changed through a simple in-game GUI too!

Known bugs:
- Your game will crash if you watch a replay that includes you dying to going below your accuracy threshold.
creator: gabriella

mods.name: Third Person Mod
mods.details: A mod which lets you play in third person
creator: ComputerElite

downloads.notes:
Changelog:
- Did you notice those objects which just suddenly disappeared? I fixed that.

mods.name: Particles
mods.details:
Quest Particles mod is basically a ParticleOverdrive port for Quest. It allows you to boost/reduce note slash particles, saber clash particles, remove environmental dust, and make particle rainbow.

This mod does nothing out of the box. You will need to use the in-game mod config UI (Settings -> Mod Settings -> ParticleTuner) to change the particle behaviors.
creator: marcuszhou

downloads.notes:
Known Issues:
* Particles having white tints (colorOverLifetime?)

mods.name: Intro Skip
mods.details:
Lets you skip sections of songs that have no notes in them.

My Patreon (If you join then you get some perks): https://www.patreon.com/henwill8?fan_landing=true
creator: Henwill8

downloads.notes:
Changelog:
- Added a mod settings page
- Made it more stable

mods.name: Song Difficulty Chart
mods.details:
A graph of the difficulty throughout the song will show in game and this can help you know when a rest or hard part of a song is coming up

My Patreon (If you join then you get some perks): https://www.patreon.com/henwill8?fan_landing=true
creator: Henwill8

mods.name: Custom Pillows Quest
mods.details:
This mod is a spiritual port of the mod for PC of the same name by Toni Macaroni!
These pillows can be anything you want them to be, as long as you can put it on a flat texture. This mod was Commissioned by @TKC 

 - Pillows Take their texture from a pool of active textures, enabled in the mod settings and listed from sdcard/ModData/com.beatgames.beatsaber/Mods/CustomPillowsQuest/images
 - Pillows spawn using a constellation, configured in the mod settings and located at sdcard/ModData/com.beatgames.beatsaber/Mods/CustomPillowsQuest/constellations
 - The mod can be disabled in the menu
 - Features a shuffle button in the menu for shuffling the current iteration of textures

Extra Pillow Textures:
https://github.com/RedBrumbler/CustomPillowsQuest/releases/latest/download/ExtraPillows.zip
creator: RedBrumbler

downloads.notes:
Changelog:
 - Allow any image type to be loaded, not just png
 - Pillows now get a texture, not a sprite loaded (speed up)
 - should crash less often as pillows now only spawn AFTER being loaded instead of assuming they are loaded, also they are being loaded later after any scene changes

mods.name: Slice Visualizer
mods.details:
After each note cut, a visual of where on the note you hit it will show. This is good for practicing accuracy.
The mod settings has options to choose how long it takes for the visual to fade.

My Patreon (If you join then you get some perks): https://www.patreon.com/henwill8?fan_landing=true
creator: Henwill8

mods.name: TrickSaber
mods.details:
The infamous Trick Saber mod, ported to Quest.

Before we continue, I'd like for all of you to read this first (unrelated to the mod itself)
The original author, Michael Zoller, has had lots of trouble lately due to the pandemic. I urge you to support him for his contributions to the Beat Saber community in the 1.11 era of the game by porting Mapping Extensions and Trick Saber. Without him, this mod wouldn't be here today.
https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/zoller27osu?locale.x=en_US


 Features: 
- Allows you to spin your sabers (left & right on the joystick)
- Allows you to throw your saber (trigger)
- Qosmetics support (not fully tested with all kinds of sabers)
- UI support
creator: zoller27osu
Fernthedev

downloads.notes:
Known Incompatibilities:
- Trick cutting DOES NOT WORK (sad)

mods.name: Third Person mod
mods.details:
A mod which lets you play in third person.

Features:
- allows you to offset your head camera position to almost everywhere with the builf in settings.
- also allows you to offset the rotation of your head camera (please note that this is a bit cursed)
- Fixed mode for better recording

Note: Third person mod does not move your head, it only moves the camera (little but subtle difference). This means you are not immune to walls.
creator: ComputerElite

mods.name: CrashMod
mods.details:
A mod which crashes your game on demand

Features:
- crash on play, turn, miss and when you are under a certain percentage
- quit instead of crash why would you even want to do this
- crash counter which countss how often it crashes your game
- crash your game with a simple button click
creator: ComputerElite

mods.name: Qounters-
mods.details:
Spice up your Beat Saber HUD with a variety of configurable Counters Qounters, which can display a wide variety of stats including:
    - Cut accuracy
    - Notes remaining
    - Misses
    - and many more!
This mod is an Oculus Quest port of Counters+ for PC.

After making changes, you can click the big blue Test button to preview your configuration.

Settings can be loaded from a PC Counters+ configuration file! Rename your CountersPlus.json to qounters-minus.json and upload it through BMBF after installing Qounters-.
creator: Danrouse

downloads.notes: Not compatible (currently) with Laurie's NoHealthAndSafety

mods.name: NoHealthAndSafety
mods.details: Removes the annoying health and safety pop-up when starting the game.
creator: Laurie

downloads.notes:
Changelog:
- Updated all libraries.
- Updated to Beat Saber 1.13.2.
Initial release

mods.name: Clock Mod
mods.details:
Features:
- Toggle Clock off in maps.
- Change Clock between 24/12 Hour format.
- Toggle Seconds on/off
- Added HoverText explanations to the config menu.

Missing Features:
- Change size
- Change color

Note:
Since the original source code only had the code to show the clock, I had to rewrite things like changing the format to 12 from 24 hours and toggling seconds on and off.
Which means any previous config values will not load. You will have to set the settings again.
creator: EnderdracheLP
BoopetyDoopety

downloads.notes: This update adds a few customization options to decide how you like your clock.
Initial release

mods.name: Practice Skipper
mods.details: Adds the ability to seek and change song speed while in practice mode. Double tap left or right with your left controller's analog stick to skip through the song, and double tap up or down to adjust the song speed. Options are available to change which controller to use, how long to skip, and how much to change speed.
creator: danrouse

downloads.notes: N/A

mods.name: PracticePlus
mods.details:
A mod that adds a few features to the practice mode menu

 - Set the NJS and note offset for the song
 - Expands the speed slider from 50%-200% to 25%-300% (because why not)

This is an updated/refactored version of the mod originally made by L_, and should hopefully be easy to update in the future.

NOTE: The in-game menu for setting njs/offset is gone for now, until I can figure out why new buttons in the pause menu aren't clickable
creator: krx

mods.name: LOLCAT
mods.details: A mod that translates most text into LOLCAT (Kingdom of Cats)
creator: MillzyG

downloads.notes:
CHANGELOG:

   - Optimised Translations
   - Created Translation Template
   - Translated More Buttons
   - Fixed Edit Avatar Menu
   - Created Translation Map

PATCH CHANGELOG:
    - Fixed SoloFreePlayViewer and PartyFreePlayViewer have the same title
SoloFreePlayViewer and PartyFreePlayViewer have the same title
Initial Release

mods.name: Beat Together
mods.details:
A multiplayer private server for the modding community. Supports crossplay between PC and Quest.

If you need install instructions, they are still on the readme located here: https://github.com/pythonology/BeatTogether.Quest#installation
creator: BeatTogether Team

downloads.notes:
Change Log
* Updated for Beat Saber 1.13.2
* Checks server availability and properly displays maintenance/out-of-date status
N/A

mods.name: BTS Yeeter
mods.details: This is a little mod that removes the BTS gremlins that fly around their maps.

N/A

mods.name: No Italics
mods.details: Unslants everything in the menu! WARNING, THIS LOOKS VERY WEIRD. THE GAME WAS NOT DESIGNED FOR THIS.
creator: Pink

mods.name: Darth Maul
mods.details:
A long awated rewrite of the original Darth Maul mod by Henwill8, which was originally created by riku1227!
This also contains many config options and is initially toggleable via the in-game modifiers.
creator: Pink
Henwill8
riku1227

mods.name: No Boom
mods.details: A Port of Spookys NoBoom mod. Disables the bomb particle effects, mainly used for recording.
creator: Pink
Spooky323

mods.name: Burn Marks Keeper
mods.details:
Stops your burn marks from ever disappearing when you collide your sabers with the ground! 
Requires PinkCore.
creator: Pink

mods.name: No Miss Text
mods.details:
A Port of CyanSnows NoMissText mod. Disables the Miss and Bad cut text from appearing, mainly used for recording.

This comes in two flavors, one with a custom BadHitSound built in Requires QuestSounds and one without!

Requires PinkCore.

Note by ComputerElite: Download here is the one without the BadHitSound. The other one is here: https://github.com/BSMGPink/QuestNoMissText/releases/download/1.0.0/NoMissTextOrBadCutSound.zip
creator: Pink
CyanSnow

mods.name: Replay Lite
mods.details:
Lets you view your replay of your best attempt or score on a song. Replays can be sped up or slowed down and paired with death replays (the replays that show on the level failed screen), this can be an excellent practice tool. View your death replay and slow it down a lot to see exactly why you died.

Full replay will still take a while but I am definitely making progress.

My Patreon (If you join then you get some perks): https://www.patreon.com/henwill8?fan_landing=true
creator: Henwill8

downloads.notes:
Changelog:
- FIXED CRASHES IN MULTI, YOU NO LONGER SHOULD HAVE TO DISABLE REPLAY TO PLAY MULTIPLAYER
- Now saves your best attempt on a song and tells you when you died on it.
- In the level failed screen you can now choose to replay that specific play.
- Added option to never save no fail plays.
- Added feature to change the song time in the pause menu (so you can now skip around and see different parts easier).

mods.name: PauseConfirm
mods.details:
Makes you confirm before going back to the menu, restarting or pressing continue when in the pause menu. This is to avoid you accidentally doing it when you're about to set a really good play, which I'm sure you've all done many times.

To choose which buttons require confirmation go to the Settings Icon in the main menu -> Mod Settings -> PauseConfirm. The default is that all three buttons require confirmation, but some might not want that.
creator: Laurie

downloads.notes:
Changelog:
- Updated for Beat Saber 1.13.2.
- Updated all libraries.

mods.name: SlowResume
mods.details:
Allows you to change how long the countdown takes to resume when paused. Disables score submission if the amount of time is increased, since this makes pausing an easier method to get back your stamina.

To change the amount of time, go to the Settings Icon in the main menu -> Mod Settings -> SlowResume.

This mod was commissioned by @KaiÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Â ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…Â¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¬ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…Â¾Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Â ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…Â¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¬ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬Ãƒâ€¦Ã‚Â¡ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¬ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬Ãƒâ€¦Ã‚Â¾ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Â ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬Ãƒâ€¦Ã‚Â¡ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¬ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…Â¡ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Â ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…Â¡ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…Â¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¬ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Â¦Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¡ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…Â¡ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¬ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…Â¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¬ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Â¦Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¾ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…Â¡ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Â ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…Â¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¬ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…Â¾Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Â ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…Â¡ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…Â¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¬ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Â¦Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¡ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…Â¡ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¬ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬Ãƒâ€¦Ã‚Â¡ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã…Â¡ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¹ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Â ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â ÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ã‚Â¬ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€ Ã¢â‚¬â„¢ÃƒÆ’Ã¢â‚¬Å¡Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â¢ÃƒÆ’Ã†â€™Ãƒâ€šÃ creator: Laurie

downloads.notes:
Changelog:
- Updated to Beat Saber 1.13.2.
- Updated all libraries.

mods.name: DebrisTweaks
mods.details: This mod allows you to modify various note debris settings. Useful for those who wish to reduce vision blocks without disabling debris completely.
creator: Raemoen

downloads.notes:
The v.1.0.0 release is here!
This version brings all features of the PC version to Quest, including a revamped UI!

mods.name: RandomEndless
mods.details:
Features:
-Random song button, when clicked it will select a random song from the current playlist.
-Endless button, when clicked it will play all valid songs in the playlist back to back.
-A bunch of settings for both Random and Endless, configurable from the Mod Settings UI in game.

OST/DLC songs are not currently supported because I cba.
Some songs won't have valid song paths, meaning endless can't find and load them, if there are songs you want to play in endless but have invalid song paths the only thing you can do is delete and reinstall them from beatsaver/beastsaber. If you have PinkCore it should tell you if a song has an invalid path.
If a song is OST/DLC or has an invalid path endless will skip it.

If you have any bug reports or feature requests DM L_#8786.
creator: L_

mods.name: RedBar
mods.details: A mod which changes the color of your health bar according to your health
creator: ComputerElite

downloads.notes:
Changelog:
- Fixed crash if you play a second song in multiplayer

Changelog:
- Updated dependencies and code to BS 1.13.2
- improved color fading
- added option to fade between 2 colors
- Replaced increments with a color picker

Incompatibilities:
- going into the settings menu of Qounters- and RedBar successively will crash the game

mods.name: ScoreSaber
mods.details: Allows you to upload scores to an online leaderboard at https://scoresaber.com. Earn PP from ranked maps, and compare scores with others. Support us on Patreon at https://patreon.com/scoresaber
creator: Umbranox

mods.name: AntiVertigo
mods.details: Spawns a plane or circle under you to help you deal with vertigo issues.
creator: RedBrumbler

mods.name: MorePrecisePlayerHeight
mods.details:
Original mod made by Eris for PC (Ported by Lillie)

A very small Beat Saber mod that's let you view your own height with higher precision... at least one more decimal.

Config:
    - enabled (true | false) - Enables the mod
    - measureInFeet (true | false ) - Changes from meter to Feet.
creator: Lillie

mods.name: QuestSounds
mods.details:
QuestSounds allows the user to change sounds without asset mods, 
just drop them into default path or your custom path!

Features:
  Support for OGG, MP3 and WAV file formats!
  Creates sounds folder at /sdcard/Android/data/com.beatgames.beatsaber/files/ 
  AFTER YOU HAVE RAN THE MOD ONCE
  Config for disabling and enabling Custom Sounds!
  Custom filepaths in config, so you can decide where you want the sounds!
creator: Lillie

mods.name: Goodbye Bug
mods.details:
Fixed bug:
    - Fixes playlist scrolling in the wrong direction when you got more than 8 playlists.
creator: Lillie

downloads.notes:
Changelog:
   - Updated beatsaber-hook version to support compatibility with newer mods!

mods.name: RumbleRumbleQuest
mods.details: RumbleRumbleQuest allows you to adjust controller haptics "rumbles" in-game. RumbleRumbleQuest is a Quest port of the popular RumbleMod.
creator: marcuszhou

mods.name: Quest Particles
mods.details: Partially ported ParticleOverdrive to the Quest. Particles (a.k.a. ParticleTuner) allows you to adjust the particles spawned after slicing a note, remove saber clashing effects, and reduce environmental dust. There's also a built-in rainbow mode for particles :)
creator: marcuszhou

mods.name: Better Menu
mods.details:
A modod that rearranges the main menu into a more organized grid layout.\r\nThis is a port of the original mod created by AceofShovels

Removed BTS advertisement from the main menu. (Implemented by Laurie)
creator: StackDoubleFlow
Laurie

mods.name: Mapping Extensions
mods.details:
Mapping Extensions adds a host of new things you can do with your maps as a mapper, and allows you to play said maps as a player.

This mod was originally created by Kyle 1413 and previously maintained by Micheal Zoller.
creator: StackDoubleFlow

downloads.notes:
Changes
- Many performance improvements :D
- Updated libraries 

Requirements
- PinkCore 1.4.1

Changes
- Many performance improvements :D
- Updated libraries

mods.name: Score Percentage
mods.details:
Now with Settings UI! wait does pc even have that????

Changelog:
-Added Settings UI
-Revamped Config code thanks to darknight1050 
-Updated for 1.12.2
-Fixed a bug with the average option
creator: FutureMapper

mods.name: QuestTrailOverlap
mods.details: Makes the saber trails overlap instead of cut into eachother
creator: RedBrumbler

mods.name: Motion Blur Disabler
mods.details: It disables the white area on the trail.
creator: ComputerElite

mods.name: Custom Fail Text
mods.details:
Allows you to customise the text that appears when you fail a level.
The text can be changed in the mod settings menu.
creator: Laurie

downloads.notes:
Changelog:
- Updated all libraries.
- Changed version to beat saber 1.13.2.
- Added cursed mode
- Added text size customisation
- Added ability to use text in bailout mode.

mods.name: Discord Presence
mods.details:
Mod Installation: https://github.com/Lauriethefish/Quest-Discord-Presence-Client/blob/main/README.md
You must follow this to set up the client on your PC and the mod on your Quest.
If you get a virus warning during installation, ignore it, this isn't a virus - Windows is oversensitive.

Alternatively, follow this guide to use MadMagic's app for general presence of any Quest app: https://github.com/madmagic007/Oculus-Quest-Presence

If it's not working, try these:
- Make sure your Quest IP hasn't changed, if so, update it in the app, see installation.
- Make sure you've opened the app.
- Make sure Beat Saber is open and your headset is on your head.
- You have discord on your PC not in the browser.
- Try restarting discord.
creator: Laurie

downloads.notes:
Changelog:
- Added support for showing the time elapsed in the main menu and in multiplayer lobbies.
NOTE: This requires an update of the client, linked below.

Changelog:
- Updated to Beat Saber 1.13.2.
- Updated all libraries.

mods.name: Qosmetics
mods.details:
This update brings the long awaited UI qosmetic selection to quest!

Added this update are: 
 - Saber switcher, settings and preview
 - Bloq switcher, settings and preview
 - Wall switcher, settings and preview

Since there are so many things added this update, I'll keep it short here, and for the full changelog you can go to:
https://github.com/RedBrumbler/Qosmetics/releases/tag/1.2.0

Also, Installing Qosmetic items works different now, you no longer use zips, instead you drop the .qsaber/.qwall/.qbloq files directly into BMBF and they get put in the correct folder! Any downloads of these filetypes in the headset should also directly install in the same way.
creator: RedBrumbler

mods.name: AutoDebris
mods.details: Automatically enables or disables debris based on the NPS of the song, or playlist that a song is in.
creator: Laurie

downloads.notes:
Changelog:
- Updated to Beat Saber 1.13.2.
- Updated all libraries.

mods.name: PinkCore
mods.details: PinkCore, formerly known as PinkUtils is a core mod that ports over many required features which ensures a smooth PC-Like experience.
creator: Pink
StackDoubleFlow
Lillie
RedBrumbler

downloads.notes:
New Features/Bug Fixes
- In-Game Patreon supporter recognition via a button on the Noticeboard.
- Requirements are now per-difficulty. (If a map has a non-Noodle difficulty, you can now play that difficulty again)
- Fixed NoteProcessorClampPatch which ensures Mapping Extensions compatibility. (thanks Stack)
- Requirements API using env vars.

New Features/Bug Fixes
- Fixed soft locking when you edit the OST packs.
- All map previews will now show, fixing any infinitely loading maps.
- Maps will showcase their mod requirements if you have any missing.
- You will be unable to play a map without its required mods.
- The NoticeBoard has now been moved to the right hand side.
- New network error message for the leaderboards.
- IN GAME CONFIG UI!

mods.name: ModList
mods.details:
Allows you to see which mods have loaded correctly ingame, and tells you why a mod failed to load. Useful for support and troubleshooting.

To view loaded mods, go to the settings icon in the main menu, then select mod settings and go to mod list.
creator: Laurie

downloads.notes:
Changelog:
- Updated all libraries.
- Updated for Beat Saber 1.13.2.
- Decreased text size to fit more mods left to right.

mods.name: DebrisKeeper
mods.details:
Prevents any debris within eight meters of the platform from disappearing.
This is a feature pulled from another project I'm working on called DebrisTweaker, which will Soon TM allow for full configuration of debris lifetime and velocity.
creator: Raemien

mods.name: MultiplayerLighting
mods.details: A mod that adds basic full color lighting to multiplayer, including ChromaLite (rainbow) support!
creator: Kognise

mods.name: Recorder
mods.details: A temporary pre-replay update mod that makes replay files.
creator: Henwill8

mods.name: Inverted Arrows
mods.details:
Inverts arrows to make you suffer, now with new features!

Now you can decide what each direction will become! So instead of getting double downs, all arrows can be down if you want them to be. You can also make the bombs flip their y position now so bloqs with a bomb under/above will be better playable
creator: RedBrumbler

mods.name: Hitscore Visualizer
mods.details: Displays your scores for each note with customizable colors, text, images, and even sound!
creator: Sc2ad
